data.comment: The match has been interrupted.
The first-half is now underway.
Throw-in for Chicago in their own half.
In the minute 3, Chicago have been awarded a corner by Armando Villarreal.
Chicago to take a throw-in in Vancouver territory.
Armando Villarreal signals a Chicago throw-in in Vancouver's half.
In the minute 4, Corner awarded to Chicago.
Vancouver awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Chicago.
In the minute 5, Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to Vancouver in their own half.
Goal kick for Vancouver at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
Throw-in for Chicago at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
In the minute 11, Chicago are coming forward and Robert Beric gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Vancouver goal kick.
Throw-in for Chicago close to the penalty box.
In the minute 12, Chicago are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Ball safe as Vancouver is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Vancouver awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 14, Armando Villarreal awards Vancouver a goal kick.
Can Vancouver get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Chicago's half?
Vancouver have a goal kick.
In the minute 20, Chicago's Robert Beric gets in a shot on goal at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to Chicago.
Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to Vancouver in their own half.
In the minute 25, Chicago are caught offside.
Goal kick for Vancouver at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.

Corner awarded to Chicago.

Vancouver are whistled for offside.
Vancouver awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 36, Throw-in for Chicago in their own half.
In Orlando, Boris Sekulic of Chicago is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Ball safe as Vancouver is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 38, Throw-in for Chicago at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
Throw-in Vancouver.
Chicago awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 40, Chicago have a dangerous throw-in.
Can Chicago get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Vancouver's half?
Hwang In-beom of Vancouver gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 41, Chicago have a goal kick.
Vancouver awarded a free kick in their own half.
Chicago to take a throw-in in Vancouver territory.
In the minute 43, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Jasser Khemiri for Vancouver who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Chicago have been awarded a corner by Armando Villarreal.
In the minute 45, Armando Villarreal awards Vancouver a goal kick.
Armando Villarreal signals a Vancouver throw-in in Chicago's half.
In the minute 45, Ball goes out of play for a Chicago goal kick.
Armando Villarreal signals a throw-in for Chicago, close to Vancouver's area.
Chicago have been awarded a corner by Armando Villarreal.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
Jasser Khemiri (Vancouver) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Cristian Dajome.
The second-half is underway at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to Chicago.
In the minute 47, Chicago drives forward and Alvaro Medran gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Vancouver needs to be cautious. Chicago have an attacking throw-in.
Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to Vancouver in their own half.
In the minute 49, Ball safe as Chicago is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Armando Villarreal awards Vancouver a goal kick.

In the minute 56, Can Chicago get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Vancouver's half?
Throw-in for Chicago close to the penalty box.
Chicago's Gaston Gimenez misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 57, Vancouver have a goal kick.
Marc Dos Santos (Vancouver) is making a second substitution, with Yordy Reyna replacing Ryan Raposo.

In the minute 59, Chicago are pushing forward but Przemyslaw Frankowski's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Vancouver goal kick.
Vancouver to take a throw-in in Chicago territory.

Miguel Navarro is on a sub for Jonathan Bornstein for Chicago.
Corner awarded to Chicago.
In the minute 62, Fabian Herbers of Chicago gets in a strike, but is off target.
Armando Villarreal awards Vancouver a goal kick.
Vancouver make their third substitution with David Milinkovic replacing Theo Bair.
In the minute 62, Cristian Gutierrez is replacing Leonard Owusu for Vancouver at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
